summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of Alki Avenue, Local Improvement District No. 2857, by grading on the westerly twenty (20) feet of that portion of Government Lot One (1), Section Ten (10), Township Twenty-four (24) North, Range Three (3) East, W.M., lying between the southerly margin of Alki Avenue and a line two hundred forty (240) feet southerly from and parallel therewith.
